description: This file contains utility functions for a Streamlit-based application, including JSON validation, message handling, tool call display, and sidebar widgets for a recipe image generator project.

methods.name: is_json
methods.description: Checks if a string is valid JSON.

methods.name: add_message
methods.description: Adds a message to the Streamlit session state, optionally including tool call information.

methods.name: display_tool_calls
methods.description: Displays a list of tool call results within a Streamlit container, including handling JSON content and metrics.

methods.name: about_widget
methods.description: Displays an about section in the Streamlit sidebar for the recipe generator.

methods.name: example_inputs
methods.description: Provides example recipe input buttons in the Streamlit sidebar for user interaction.
